sen.j: 渋谷向山古墳（しぶたにむこうやまこふん）は、奈良県天理市渋谷町にある前方後円墳である。
sen.e: The Shibutani Mukoyama tumulus is a keyhole-shaped tumulus located in Shibutani-cho, Tenri City, Nara Prefecture.
The Shibutani Mukoyama tumulus is a keyhole-shaped tumulus located in Shibutani-cho, Tenri City, Nara Prefecture.
The Shibutani Mukoyama tumulus is a keyhole-shaped tumulus located in Shibutani-cho, Tenri City, Nara Prefecture.
Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 宮内庁により景行天皇陵（山邊道上陵）に指定されている。
sen.e: This tumulus is designated by The Imperial Household Agency as the mausoleum of Emperor Keiko (also called "Yamanobe no michi no e no Misasagi" (literally, a mausoleum along the Yamanobe road)).
This tumulus is designated by The Imperial Household Agency as the mausoleum of Emperor Keiko (also called "Yamanobe no michi no e no Misasagi" [literally, a mausoleum along the Yamanobe road]).
sen.cmt: 括弧内括弧を［］に訂正しました。
sen.e: This tumulus is designated by The Imperial Household Agency as the mausoleum of Emperor Keiko (also called "Yamanobe no michi no e no Misasagi" [literally, a mausoleum along the Yamanobe road]).

sen.j: 江戸時代には崇神天皇陵と思われていた。
sen.e: In the Edo period, this tumulus was considered as that of Emperor Sujin.
In the Edo period, this tumulus was considered as that of Emperor Sujin.
In the Edo period, this tumulus was considered as that of Emperor Sujin.

sen.j: 築造年代は現在の崇神天皇陵である行燈山古墳より少し遅れた4世紀後半と推定される。
sen.e: This tumulus is considered having been constructed in the later half of the fourth century, slightly later than the Andonyama tumulus, now designated as the mausoleum of Emperor Suijin.
This tumulus is considered having been constructed in the later half of the fourth century, slightly later than the Andonyama tumulus, now designated as the mausoleum of Emperor Suijin.
This tumulus is considered having been constructed in the later half of the fourth century, slightly later than the Andonyama tumulus, now designated as the mausoleum of Emperor Suijin.
Investigations for this tumulus were made in 1996.
Investigations for this tumulus were made in 1996.
Investigations for this tumulus were made in 1996.

sen.j: 全長310メートル、前方部幅170メートル高さ23メートル、後円部径168メートル高さ23メートル。
sen.e: With a total length of 310 m, the size of its front part is 170 m in width and 23 m in height and that of the back part 168 m in diameter and 23 m in height.
With a total length of 310m, the size of its front part is 170m in width and 23m in height and that of the back part 168m in diameter and 23m in height.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: With a total length of 310m, the size of its front part is 170m in width and 23m in height and that of the back part 168m in diameter and 23m in height.

sen.j: 墳丘は東西方向に主軸をおき、後円部は正円形で3段築成、前方部も3段で築かれている。
sen.e: With the main line in the east-west direction, its round part is structured in three steps, with each step level made in a precisely round shape, and the front part is also structured in three steps.
With the main line in the east-west direction, its round part is structured in three steps, with each step level made in a precisely round shape, and the front part is also structured in three steps.
With the main line in the east-west direction, its round part is structured in three steps, with each step level made in a precisely round shape, and the front part is also structured in three steps.

sen.j: 後円部頂上は平坦で円形である。
sen.e: The top of the round part is flat and round.
The top of the round part is flat and round.
The top of the round part is flat and round.

sen.j: 前方部の頂上も平坦であり、長い台形である。
sen.e: The top of the front part is also flat and trapezoidal.
The top of the front part is also flat and trapezoidal.
The top of the front part is also flat and trapezoidal.

sen.j: 前方部は撥形をしていない。
sen.e: The front part is not shaped in a plectrum.
The front part is not shaped in a plectrum.
The front part is not shaped in a plectrum.

sen.j: 前方部幅は後円部の直径にほぼ等しく、後円部の前方部に対する比率はおよそ11.1である。
sen.e: The width of the front part is almost the same as the diameter of the round part, with the ratio at 1: 1.1.
The width of the front part is almost the same as the diameter of the round part, with the ratio at 1: 1.1.
The width of the front part is almost the same as the diameter of the round part, with the ratio at 1: 1.1.

sen.j: 周濠は左右対称の盾形であるとされているが、当初からのものであるかどうか疑問視されている。
sen.e: It is said that the surrounding moat is shield-shaped symmetrically, but it is not clear whether the moat retains the original shape.
It is said that the surrounding moat is shield-shaped symmetrically, but it is not clear whether the moat retains the original shape.
It is said that the surrounding moat is shield-shaped symmetrically, but it is not clear whether the moat retains the original shape.
